entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS tests failing with WORKLOAD TIMED OUT - Killing user command. #108103
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests failing with System.TimeoutException : Timeout 30000ms exceeded. #108102
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Assertion failed 'likelihood <= 1.0' #108100
  • [Proposal] Vectorized System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<K, V> #108098
    Future
  • EnC: Mono throws when member accessibility is changed #108097
  • Performance regression on .NET 9, compared to .NET 8 #108096
  • Potentially bad loop invariant code motion for vectors #108092

Closed

  • NativeAOT - prior art for infering custom attributes #108101
  • BinaryFormatter removal from .NET 9 is complete #106240
    9.0.0
  • Improve error message for unexpected hardware exceptions in managed code with new EH #107145
    10.0.0
  • Test build failure: "coreclr Common Pri1 Test Build AnyOS AnyCPU checked" CI job fails #108076

PullRequests

Created

  • delete deadcode from nsutilpriv.h #108104
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial bench #108099
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: refactor AddCodeDsc #108095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix typo `ConcatinatedString` -> `ConcatenatedString` #108033
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • fix broken docs #108094
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add missing params to WhenEach overloads #107964
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [browser] Fix custom icu fingerprinting. #108025
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [workloads] Consider workload band versions stable when we are at rtm #108085
    area-Build-mono, area-Workloads, 10.0.0
  • Delete FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL define #108048
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix System.Runtime reference in a new test #108077
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] improve local diagnostic of AOT enabled build #108059
    area-Build-mono
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Add support for (experimental) profile-based trimming #108049
    Hackathon, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build-runtime-tests-and-send-to-helix auth for internal PRs #107635
    area-Infrastructure
  • First-class Span #107737
    area-Meta
  • Replace UseSystemResourceKeys substitution with FeatureSwitchDefinition #107310
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove explicit dependency on System.Buffers from System.Formats.Asn1 #107679
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    area-Infrastructure
  • InlineArray design spec/doc #108044
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0-rc2] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108091
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Default app.manifest should include <heapType>SegmentHeap</heapType> #43611

Closed

  • NET9-pr7 x86 AOT Some Registry Missing #43208
  • Can no longer compile any project after upgrading from .NET 9.0 Preview 7 to .NET 9.0 RC1 #43339

PullRequests

Created

  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Better Conversion from Collection Expression (VS 17.12, .NET 9) #8374
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0047 should not appear in pattern-match expression when-clause of switch-case. #75203
  • IDE0045 Bad suggestion results in CS8602 false-positive, revert results in bad IDE0045 suggestion #75200
  • WarningsAsErrors is not working #75198
  • Improved async method builders #75196
    Backlog
  • Unexpected value `QueryClause` of type `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundKind` #75194
    17.12

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35320.61 #75190

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • VisitCollectionBuilderCollectionExpression - Ensure target of a spread element is rewritten. #75201
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Use SegmentHeap by default in app.manifest #75199
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2543568 #75195
    auto-merge
  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Test EnC document diagnostics in non-host workspace #75140
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Include workspace kind in error message for easier diagnostics #75137
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add more better conversions tests #75188
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75189
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Fix parser regressions of conditional expressions #75075
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix reporting of MSBuild warnings in MSBuildWorkspace #75183
    Area-IDE, Community, IDE-MSBuildWorkspace, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 Blazor - Navigation - AuthenticationStateProvider Bug #58009
  • Print warning when using certificate from %APPDATA%\ASP.NET\Https #58008
  • Polymorphic model collection validation is skipped #58007
  • OpenAPI document generation does not generate correct refs for self-referencing collection properties #58006
  • [Blazor][net9] System.InvalidOperationException: Multiple constructors accepting all given argument types have been found in type 'Component'. There should only be one applicable constructor #58004
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #58003
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58002
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58001
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58000

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #57970
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server Unable to find service type 'Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescriptions.IDocumentProvider' in dependency injection container. #57939

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix concurrent request handling for OpenAPI documents #57972
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

Issues

Updated

  • libsosplugin cannot be loaded into lldb (macos arm64) #4259
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to set flyout burger menu icon color in Shell when customized with FontImageSource #24857
  • Android ImageButton Aspect="AspectFit" not display correctly #24856
  • IconTintColorBehavior in listview item loose setting (or not updated) after item filtering #24855
  • Asp.net core #24853

Closed

  • [regression/7.0.92] IndicatorView not visible on iOS #17831
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #20282
  • Maui - some nugets do not work as path is too long "Could not find a part of the path" #17828
    Backlog
  • No se encuentra la tarea "maui: Build". #24419
  • Error when attempting to create a new MAUI project #24418

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar

Merged

  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    area-layout, area-testing, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 (take 3) #24822
  • [net9.0] Update versions on public rc2 #24845
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Improve MauiFactory performance by avoiding reflection to get base classes #24775
    area-core-hosting, community ✨
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • [xaml] fix potential NRE in `{Binding}` #24756
    area-xaml
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • [macios] Bump .NET 8 to support Xcode 16.0 #24833

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • mysql IdentityColumn not primary key bug #34679
  • Migration ignores Fluent API configuration via IEntityTypeConfiguration #34674

Updated

  • Fully support complex types with the InMemory provider #31464
    Backlog
  • SplitQuery add transaction settings with isolation level #30353
    Backlog
  • Allow mapping optional complex properties #31376
    Backlog
  • UseTransaction() operator to automatically execute a query in a specific isolation level (e.g. split query) #34724
    Backlog
  • Support projecting different navigations (but same type) via conditional operator #34589
    Backlog
  • Breaking: ArgumentOutOfRangeException in v9-RC1 #34728
    9.0.0
  • Unified relationship-based query tests (navigations, owned, complex...) #33985
    MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix: Value cannot be null parameter name key #34730
  • Use right hand type mapping for more binary expressions when left is an object #34729
